cn.description:
经典三国单机版

《逐鹿》是一款基于同名历史沙盘游戏引擎开发而成的三国题材回合制策略游戏。在硝烟四起、诸侯争霸的三国乱世中，玩家可以在剧本中任意选择势力，饰演主公。通过内政、外交等玩法助你运筹帷幄。带领麾下群雄，攻城略地，在辽阔的战场上开疆扩土。或兴复汉室，或成一代枭雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

问鼎九州，逐鹿三国

《逐鹿》的历史剧本以《三国演义》为蓝本推演而来，游戏贯穿历史典故，力求还原三国时期的史实风貌。玩家可以任意挑选剧本，并饰演其中一势力的主公，谋定三国，一统九州。

山河为子，天下为局

《逐鹿》以经典六角战棋玩法为核心战斗模式，玩家可以指挥部队以“六角战棋”的形式纵横驰骋于大战场之上，或与敌人短兵相接，或以计谋决胜千里之外，在矢石之间，开疆扩土。

坚甲利兵，攻无不克

在游戏中兵种可分为步兵、骑兵、机械三大类，细分则有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、轻骑兵等十余种。还有数十种专属兵种可以携带，出征时根据战况调配兵种阵容，能够达到先发制人，克敌机先的效果。

鸾翔凤集，龙幡虎纛

根据历史文献记载以及结合三国演义内容，目前游戏中已设计武将有600余名。每个武将具有独特的特性，可以凸显武将的差异化。不仅如此，我们还为历史名将绘制了精致的专属立绘，彰显其个性。

cn.description:
在战场上，谁说只有手柄才能成为武器？  
DaDaDaDa - 空气枪带来了前所未有的互动体验！通过手机和手表，你能变身为枪械大师，体验逼真的体感射击。想象一下，你和朋友一起拿着手机模拟空气手枪，佩戴手表模拟机枪发射 “DaDaDaDa”的声音，火力全开！震动反馈增强了每一次射击的真实感，每次 “BiuBiuBiu”的枪声让你瞬间沉浸在游戏世界中。而不同的枪械带来的独特声音，像“PewPewPew”的M14步枪，给你一种独特的战斗体验。

为什么DaDaDaDa更好玩？

DaDaDaDa - 空气枪不仅仅是一个普通的射击游戏。它将手机、手表与真实的枪械体验融合，每个动作都被精准捕捉，带来身临其境的游戏感受。每当你点击开枪时，“DaDaDaDa”的声音便会响起，强劲的火力让你感受到震撼。而当你换上空气手枪，则会听到“BiuBiuBiu”的轻巧射击声，细腻的音效让每一场战斗都不单调。不同枪械带来的独特声音体验，将为你创造一个多样化的游戏世界。

DaDaDaDa的优势之处

1. 震动反馈：每个枪支的火力不同，震动反馈也不同。选择一把强力的机枪，如加特林，体验来自“DaDaDaDa”射击的强烈震动感。你可以感受到像“BiuBiuBiu”的沙漠之鹰的精准射击，或者体验“PewPewPew”的M14步枪带来的稳定射击感，每种枪支都有它独特的魅力。
    
2. 真实的换弹动作：每次换弹时，你都会听到真实的换弹音效，同时模仿真实的换弹动作。这种互动体验让你完全沉浸在游戏中，仿佛你正在执行一项重要的战斗任务，而不是单纯的游戏。
    
3. 手表与手机同步/独立运行：无论你是一个人玩，还是和朋友一起，手表和手机都能独立运行，甚至一个人可以持双枪，玩转不同的枪支。你可以在激烈的战斗中切换沙漠之鹰、AK47、加特林、甚至M14步枪，每种武器带来不同的声音和手感。比如在你手上，手机发出“DaDaDaDa”的狂暴机枪声，而手表则模拟“BiuBiuBiu”的精准手枪射击声，每种武器都有各自的独特魅力。
    
4. 适合多人互动：不论是和朋友、家人，还是情侣一同分享这款游戏，DaDaDaDa都能让你和他们一起感受竞技和合作的乐趣。想象一下，和你的朋友在家里进行一场“DaDaDaDa”与“BiuBiuBiu”的对决，或者和孩子们一起体验“PewPewPew”的M14步枪，仿佛置身于一个充满挑战的射击场景中。
    

DaDaDaDa自己怎么玩？和朋友怎么玩？

1. 自己玩  
    如果你自己玩时，你可以戴上手表、手持手机，模拟多种枪械的射击。“DaDaDaDa”的机枪扫射声，或者“BiuBiuBiu”的手枪精准射击声，每种声音都能带给你不同的体验。在你换上空气枪的同时，手表和手机的震动反馈也在提醒你，战斗正愈发激烈。
    
2. 和朋友一起玩  
    和朋友一起玩时，你们可以手持手机和手表，互相对战或者合作。使用不同的枪支，你将听到不同的枪声，“DaDaDaDa”的狂暴机枪声，“BiuBiuBiu”的轻盈手枪声，甚至是“PewPewPew”的M14步枪的精准射击声，每种武器都有各自的魅力。
    
3. 与家人或情侣玩  
    和家人或情侣一起玩时，你们不仅能享受亲密的互动，还能通过游戏加深彼此的感情。想象一下，你和你的伴侣或孩子站在一起，使用“DaDaDaDa”的加特林机枪或者“BiuBiuBiu”的沙漠之鹰模拟射击，一起进行友好的竞技和合作。
    

你不应该错过DaDaDaDa

DaDaDaDa - 空气枪不仅仅是一款射击游戏，它还是一次身临其境的冒险。每一次“DaDaDaDa”的枪声、每一次“BiuBiuBiu”的射击和“PewPewPew”的M14步枪声，都让你无法停下手中的动作，仿佛成为了战场上的英雄。无论你是独自挑战，还是和朋友、家人一起对战，DaDaDaDa都能带给你不一样的乐趣。

我们非常希望听到您的声音！  
在App中给我们留言告诉我们你想要什么样的武器，您的反馈对我们至关重要！我们会尽可能满足大家的需求，并不断更新DaDaDaDa - 空气枪，让每一场战斗都更加刺激、更多样化。

赶快加入我们，和你的手表、手机一起，感受这个充满惊喜与挑战的游戏世界！你绝对不想错过这场刺激的射击之旅！

Luwian 是一款复杂的相机应用程序，旨在提供对相机硬件的完全手动控制，从而使用户能够使用 DSLR 设计释放他们的创造力。此外，该应用程序还附带 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 后处理编辑器，可提高图像质量。

Luwian 提供的手动控制包括曝光、对焦、对焦锁定、变焦和白平衡，以及预设和自定义调整选项、ISO 和快门速度。该应用程序还提供对 40 个滤镜、29 个虚拟 FX、17 个模拟电影和 36 个经典电影色调的访问，这些都可以在主相机面板上轻松使用。

Luwian 是业余和专业摄影师的强大工具，提供一系列功能，使他们能够轻松捕捉令人惊叹的图像。其直观的界面确保用户可以轻松导航应用程序并访问其功能，而其手动控件使他们能够对相机硬件进行精确控制。借助 Luwian，摄影师可以精确、清晰地捕捉他们的视觉，使其成为摄影领域人士的理想工具。

cn.description:
欢迎来到魔王城堡！《魔王终局》是一款类自走棋的策略休闲游戏，你的智慧和随机应变能力，将为你导向胜利——当然，还需要一些运气！

在游戏里，你将不再是人们口中常说的冒险者了，而是“邪恶”的魔王本王！面对为了宝物而前仆后继的冒险者，请招募强大的随从，搭配合理的阵营，把这些冒险者都赶出去！

在回合次数内击败冒险者，否则宝石就要被偷走啦！

游戏中目前有240种随从，战斗开始前，他们将会随机出现，根据局势选择一个得力助手，构筑一个相辅相成的强大阵容，抵御敌人的来袭吧！

目前《魔王终局》中有201种财宝、19种传奇财宝、13种难度财宝。当你将冒险者肃清后，根据你的阵容选择合适的财宝，这可能成为局面逆转的关键！

游戏操作简单，研究起来却别有洞天。多尝试各种不同流派的通关方法吧！

短小精悍的游戏内容，最适合在繁琐的工作学习之余来上这么一把，但要注意，小游戏才最杀时间！

cn.trackName: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验
cn.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

cn.description:
我们原创的电影效果模拟器应用程序非常逼真，甚至被用于拍摄奥斯卡获奖纪录片《寻找小糖人》中的场景！

轻松实时录制8毫米复古影片，即时可得、无需胶片和冲印。

8毫米相机带您进入时光通道，在手机或iPad的镜头中重现老电影的独特魅力。本相机附送多种镜头和胶片，轻松组合出上百种独特的怀旧风格，让您重温往日美好情怀。无论您需要添加灰尘、划痕、复古色调、光影闪动、漏光还是画面抖动，通过手指轻轻一点即可完成。

使用实时胶片效果拍摄照片和视频

▶ 结合胶片颜色、光晕、灰尘和划痕、胶片颗粒和柔化效果，打造真正的老派电影
▶ 调整效果的强度以实现自己独特的视觉风格
▶ 10种型号镜头（边框）、21套来自不同时代的复古胶片
▶ 另加21套精确复刻电影史上一些最具标志性的真实胶片和过期胶片 - 可以通过订阅/购买8mm Pro获得
▶ 添加逼真的放映机音效，静音以模仿默片或者打开麦克录音
▶ 模拟8毫米幻灯机，使画面上下随机抖动
▶ 支持最高4K 30帧的实时特效录影、在较新的设备上可同时录制不加滤镜的视频

用于电影创作的紧凑型编辑器

▶ 将胶片和边框效果添加到视频或照片
▶ 剪辑视频，平移和缩放照片
▶ 从音乐库添加配乐
▶ 从5个独特的主题模版中选择匹配的标题、过渡

通过订阅解锁所有功能

▶ 您可以通过订阅解锁所有的滤镜
▶ 7天免费试用、试用期结束后，您将被收取年度订阅费
▶ 除非在当前订阅期结束前至少24小时关闭自动续订，否则您的订阅将自动续订。您可以前往“设置”> Apple ID > ”订阅“以关闭自动续订
▶ 您也可以选择一次性购买8mm Pro以解锁所有功能

cn.description:
Luwian 是一款复杂的相机应用程序，旨在提供对相机硬件的完全手动控制，从而使用户能够使用 DSLR 设计释放他们的创造力。此外，该应用程序还附带 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 后处理编辑器，可提高图像质量。

Luwian 提供的手动控制包括曝光、对焦、对焦锁定、变焦和白平衡，以及预设和自定义调整选项、ISO 和快门速度。该应用程序还提供对 40 个滤镜、29 个虚拟 FX、17 个模拟电影和 36 个经典电影色调的访问，这些都可以在主相机面板上轻松使用。

Luwian 是业余和专业摄影师的强大工具，提供一系列功能，使他们能够轻松捕捉令人惊叹的图像。其直观的界面确保用户可以轻松导航应用程序并访问其功能，而其手动控件使他们能够对相机硬件进行精确控制。借助 Luwian，摄影师可以精确、清晰地捕捉他们的视觉，使其成为摄影领域人士的理想工具。

hk.description:
經典三國單機版

《逐鹿》是一款基於同名歷史沙盤遊戲引擎開發而成的三國題材回合制策略遊戲。在硝煙四起、諸侯爭霸的三國亂世中，玩家可以在劇本中任意選擇勢力，飾演主公。通過內政、外交等玩法助你運籌帷幄。帶領麾下群雄，攻城略地，在遼闊的戰場上開疆擴土。或興復漢室，或成一代梟雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

問鼎九州，逐鹿三國

《逐鹿》的歷史劇本以《三國演義》為藍本推演而來，遊戲貫穿歷史典故，力求還原三國時期的史實風貌。玩家可以任意挑選劇本，並飾演其中一勢力的主公，謀定三國，一統九州。

山河為子，天下為局

《逐鹿》以經典六角戰棋玩法為核心戰鬥模式，玩家可以指揮部隊以「六角戰棋」的形式縱橫馳騁於大戰場之上，或與敵人短兵相接，或以計謀決勝千里之外，在矢石之間，開疆擴土。

堅甲利兵，攻無不克

在遊戲中兵種可分為步兵、騎兵、機械三大類，細分則有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、輕騎兵等十餘種。還有數十種專屬兵種可以攜帶，出征時根據戰況調配兵種陣容，能夠達到先發制人，克敵機先的效果。

鸞翔鳳集，龍幡虎纛

根據歷史文獻記載以及結合三國演義內容，目前遊戲中已設計武將有600余名。每個武將具有獨特的特性，可以凸顯武將的差異化。不僅如此，我們還為歷史名將繪制了精緻的專屬立繪，彰顯其個性。

hk.releaseNotes:
We’ve been working under the hood to make Controller even smarter and more intuitive – and this update lays important groundwork for the future!

New Features & Improvements
* Smarter Metadata: We’ve introduced a new metadata structure behind the scenes, paving the way for exciting future features.
* Accessory Sorting: You can now sort not only rooms but also individual accessories – making your setup more organized than ever.
* Unique Accessory Names: Controller now helps you automatically avoid duplicate names for devices, keeping things clear and conflict-free.
* Better Naming with Room Prefixes: If you’re using room-based name prefixes, you’ll notice improved handling when moving accessories or renaming rooms.
* Navigate to Rooms Faster: From the accessory details, you can now jump directly to the room view for quicker navigation.

Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where some users couldn’t select characteristics when creating service groups.
* Resolved a bug where camera streams failed to load correctly for some users.
* Many smaller improvements under the hood to make the app more stable and reliable.

Update now and enjoy a cleaner, smarter experience with Controller for HomeKit! As always, your feedback helps us make the app even better – thank you!
hk.description:
Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

Privacy Policy: 
https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/

Terms of Use: 
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

hk.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

遊戲特色

指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。準備好發動英勇的攻擊，堅守陣地，拯救平民，潛入超級計算機和各種英雄的物品。每個任務需要新的戰術和行動才能取得勝利。

通過17次終結式特別行動的戰術規則測試你的機智。每個關卡通過傷痕銘記挑戰。諒你也不敢。

解鎖不可能模式。僅對大無畏敢死隊開放。諒你絕對不敢。

在史詩戰鬥中擊敗巨大而非凡的頭目。這些頭目卑鄙而異常地巨大，他們決心要將你碾碎。鋼鐵戰隊，整裝待發！

40+升級以提升你的戰略，同時授予你的部隊防禦無人機，凝固汽油彈火箭，反彈爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

14位具有出色能力的英雄聽從你的調遣。將他們訓練到極致出色，否則惹惱他們後果自負。

8種可向敵人發動進攻的特種武器，讓你的戰術更加具有深度。還有什麼比得上一個瞄準了的導彈？對50枚高爆炸炸彈的軌道炮襲擊！

完成70+成就中的任何成就，贏得你應得的獎勵

選擇你的遊戲困難模式，找到屬於你的公平挑戰：休閒，普通或老兵別太狂妄了要么狂妄一點你自己決定！！

hk.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

因無數勇者們的侵略，副本已成廢墟，魔界也遭受破壞。
你為了重建魔界，需要侵略勇者們的根據地。
在那裡，恢復魔界的力量，並擊敗光之軍隊吧。

得到強大的力量，就可以獲得魔界之魔神們的祝福。
接合魔神與怪物的力量，壓制巨大的勇者軍團吧。

hk.description:
【遊戲簡介】
《召喚騎士團》是由橄欖熊貓工作室製作的一款RPG卡牌像素風遊戲。 分為《騎士之歌》和《群星之章》兩部分玩法和內容，遊戲將透過「10TWD付費下載，內購解鎖」的方式取得全部的遊玩內容。

【內購解鎖】
全內容解鎖：8.99USD
騎士之歌劇情模式：4.99USD
群星之章自由模式：4.99USD
兩個模式都支持先體驗再付費解鎖，《騎士之歌》可以免費體驗至第二章節結束，《群星之章》免費體驗遊戲內時間一年。
PS：該金額會根據當地匯率進行換算

《騎士之歌》：
劇情改編自諾貝爾文學獎得主亨里克·顯克微支《十字軍騎士》，主要玩法為卡牌的RPG角色扮演，在卡牌戰鬥的同時加入了夥伴技能連攜系統，將根據玩家打出 的牌釋放不同的專屬技能，從而建構不同的流派。 在遊戲中也會認識並招募到眾多同伴，踏上一段波瀾壯闊的旅程。

《群星之章》：
遊戲的主舞台在一個名為安塔納的魔幻大陸上，在這裡擁有風俗迥異的六個國家，玩家將扮演其中一個王國的小領主。
在魔界即將入侵這片大陸的前夕，玩家需要前往各地尋找自己騎士團的伙伴，建立屬於自己的騎士團，展開冒險，增強自己的實力，守護人類戰線。

【設備支援】
·iOS 10.0及更高版本
·運行記憶體3G以及以上機型
·iphone7 以上機型
·ipad Air3以上機型

【聯絡我們】
遊戲過程中需要協助，或遇到問題，可以通過郵件聯絡反饋。
官方郵箱：knight@longyougame.com

hk.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

遊戲特色

指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。準備好發動英勇的攻擊，堅守陣地，拯救平民，潛入超級計算機和各種英雄的物品。每個任務需要新的戰術和行動才能取得勝利。

通過17次終結式特別行動的戰術規則測試你的機智。每個關卡通過傷痕銘記挑戰。諒你也不敢。

解鎖不可能模式。僅對大無畏敢死隊開放。諒你絕對不敢。

在史詩戰鬥中擊敗巨大而非凡的頭目。這些頭目卑鄙而異常地巨大，他們決心要將你碾碎。鋼鐵戰隊，整裝待發！

40+升級以提升你的戰略，同時授予你的部隊防禦無人機，凝固汽油彈火箭，反彈爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

14位具有出色能力的英雄聽從你的調遣。將他們訓練到極致出色，否則惹惱他們後果自負。

8種可向敵人發動進攻的特種武器，讓你的戰術更加具有深度。還有什麼比得上一個瞄準了的導彈？對50枚高爆炸炸彈的軌道炮襲擊！

完成70+成就中的任何成就，贏得你應得的獎勵

選擇你的遊戲困難模式，找到屬於你的公平挑戰：休閒，普通或老兵別太狂妄了要么狂妄一點你自己決定！！

hk.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

hk.description:
《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？

 - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！

 - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。

- 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。

 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。

 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。

 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。

 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

hk.description:
中隊已經到達你的移動設備！躲避子彈風暴，面對可怕的空中戰爭機器！帶領你的中隊在兩個不同的戰役中取得勝利，充滿故事曲折和傳奇首領大戰！

德國空軍王牌 - 中隊是一款驚心動魄的垂直捲動射擊遊戲，具有引人入勝的全語音敘述。躲避子彈，收集大量增強器，明智地使用特殊技能擊敗敵人。總計50個關卡的兩大戰役，一波又一波的各種致命敵人，眾多史詩首領大戰。你能完成任務嗎？

當歐洲看起來還是自由的時候，一個被稱為“德國空軍王牌”的秘密德國突擊隊借此機會反擊並入侵美國！你的責任就是，在誇張的空戰中，駕駛致命的鋼鐵之翼，重建和平與自由！但是，每個故事都有兩個方面。隨著德國空軍王牌開始對美國進攻，你負責帶領一群精銳德國飛行員執行秘密任務。從百慕大三角的一個秘密基地，開始詭計多端的史詩級空中冒險。選擇你的陣營，決定你的角色，然後起飛！

- 驚心動魄的射擊遊戲，具有爆炸性的特效
- 英勇的非玩家角色僚機將遵從你的命令
- 每架僚機都有包含獨特技能的技能樹
- 富有挑戰性的成就系統
- 引人入勝的故事情節和全語音角色
- 50個關卡和刺激的任務 
- 12個壯觀的首領大戰
- 史詩般的電影式管弦樂配樂

hk.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

hk.description:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE
Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

hk.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

1.优化了赛博护士的对话体验
hk.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜

hk.description:
在這個快節奏的動作rogue-lite遊戲《孤骨勇士》中，失去頭顱反而是戰鬥的一部分。

遊戲擁有100位獨特能力的可操控角色，配合眾多道具，可創造出既瘋狂又具挑戰性的戰鬥。
魔王城廢墟
人類對魔王城的攻擊歷史悠久，此次卻與眾不同。
這次不僅冒險家加入戰鬥，還有帝國軍隊和被稱為「卡倫之英雄」的領袖共同發動全面攻擊，決心一舉根絕魔族。
他們以壓倒性的人數攻陷了魔族堡壘，並成功將其徹底摧毀。城堡中的所有魔族都被俘虜，唯獨一個名叫「孤骨」的孤獨骷髏逃脫了。
黑暗鏡子模式
完成主線故事後，挑戰自我極限，試試全新的「黑暗鏡子」模式吧！

遊戲特色
- 在這場魔族的絕望之中，你是最後的希望！化身為小小骷髏「孤骨」，踏上旅程去擊敗狂妄的英雄們，解救被卡倫墮落軍隊俘虜的魔王。
- 換上新的孤骨，感受失去頭顱的痛快：借用前任擁有者的力量和華服，搭配獨特的道具來創造連鎖技能，戰勝敵人。
- 不死不休：在這款動作滿載的rogue-lite平台遊戲中，你將迎接一切挑戰，直至最終。
- 觀賞充滿活力、風格卡通的像素藝術2D動畫，幫助各種魔族生物恢復本來面目。
- 從埃及的木乃伊到希臘的牛頭怪，甚至《Dead Cells》的官方跨界合作……你能找到遊戲中所有有趣的彩蛋嗎？

專為移動裝置精心重新設計
- 改進的介面——獨家手機用戶介面，完整的觸控操作
- Game Center 成就
- 雲端儲存——在 iOS 裝置間共享你的進度
- 支援 MFi 控制器
- 兼容 iPhone 15（包括 Pro Max）

hk.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

曝光控制

hk.description:
After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love?

In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city — from Bakırköy to Üsküdar — to find the woman you love.

Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul — from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor.

On your journey to save your girlfriend, you’ll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins—and their stories—will push you to make difficult moral choices.

To move forward, you’ll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely.

Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit.

Witness the struggle to survive—and the power of hope.
In this unforgettable journey, you’ll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

hk.releaseNotes: New update content!
hk.description:
Death is not the end.

Play as a failed alchemic experiment and explore the sprawling, ever-changing castle to find out what happened on this gloomy island…! 
That is, assuming you’re able to fight your way past its keepers.

Dead Cells is a roguevania action platformer that will require you to master frantic 2D combat with a wide variety of weapons and skills against merciless minions and boss.

Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat.

First available on PC and consoles, the indie hit Dead Cells is now slaying foes on mobile!

Main Features
• Roguevania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath

• Frantic and Dynamic 2D Action: Learn your enemies’ patterns to stay alive, or prepare to be sent back to your cell before you can say “baguette”

• Nonlinear Progression: Unlock new levels with every death, opt for the path that suits your current build, your playstyle or just your mood. 
Surely, the ramparts can’t be as bad as the sewers, right?

• Play at your own pace: Will you explore every nook and cranny of the castle, or rush to the end?

*Latest updates are available: Clean Cut & The End is Near*

RETURN TO CASTLEVANIA DLC
Time for some vampire slaying
• New storyline - overcome the Ruler of Darkness alongside Alucard and Richter Belmont,
• 2 new biomes - Explore Dracula's Castle and its outskirts
• 9 new monsters - Werewolves, haunted armors, and medusas are waiting for you
• 14 new weapons - wield the Vampire Killer or the Holy Water to defeat creatures of the night,
• 3 new bosses - go fangs to fangs against Death and Dracula himself
• 20 new outfits - dress as your favorite Castlevania characters such as Simon and Richter Belmont or Alucard
• Alternative soundtracks - play along 51 Castlevania original tracks and 12 tunes reimagined in the style of Dead Cells

THE BAD SEED DLC
You reap what you sow
• New levels to lose your head in the not-so-peaceful Dilapidated Arboretum and the noxious Morass of the Banished
• New monsters to rip to pieces: get to know the locals, such as the Jerkshroom and the Yeeter
• New weapons to play with: trim sticking-out heads with the Scythe Claw, or make them dance to the sound of the Rhythm n' Bouzouki
• New boss to fight against: Mama Tick is dying to meet you

FATAL FALLS DLC
Ready for a leap of faith?
• 3 new biomes - Get some fresh air at the Fractured Shrines, splash around at the Undying Shores and take a picture at the Mausoleum
• 8 new monsters - The Cold Blooded Guardians and their friends would love to teach you about their culture. ... Wait, aren't those relatives of yours in the Undying Shores...?
• 7 new weapons - Lil' Serenade is perfect for breaking the ice with the locals, although the Snake Fangs would make for a perfect souvenir...
• 1 new boss - The Scarecrow is very proud of his gardening skills and won't hesitate to show off


QUEEN AND THE SEA  DLC
Take it to the sea!
• 2 new biomes - Battle your way through a rotten shipwreck, or scale a burning lighthouse and confront your deadliest foe yet.
• 9 new weapons, including a throwable shark, a trident and a pirate hook hand (eyepatch not included). 
• 2 new bosses - Don't lose your head before you meet the Queen!

This DLC also gives you the usual extras: 
- A not-so-cute pet. 
- Loads of new outfits. 
- New enemies to bash.

WARNING: Devices with less than 2 Gb of RAM may not be able to run this content correctly. We recommend not to take this DLC if your device is under 2gb of RAM.


Carefully redesigned for mobile with a revamped interface
• Two game modes available: Original & Auto-Hit

• Custom controls & More touch controls options available: Change the buttons’ position and size to your liking, swipe to dodge…

• MFi external controller support

• No ads, no F2P mechanics!

If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com
 with as much information as possible on the issue.

hk.description:
Escape your childhood fears.

First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile!
 Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears!
Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal.
As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover.
Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out!
Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design.
Sneak your way out of the Maw’s dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. 

FEATURES

- Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure
- Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants
- Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles
- Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE

- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- Compatible with MFi controllers

If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.

mo.description:
經典三國單機版

《逐鹿》是一款基於同名歷史沙盤遊戲引擎開發而成的三國題材回合制策略遊戲。在硝煙四起、諸侯爭霸的三國亂世中，玩家可以在劇本中任意選擇勢力，飾演主公。通過內政、外交等玩法助你運籌帷幄。帶領麾下群雄，攻城略地，在遼闊的戰場上開疆擴土。或興復漢室，或成一代梟雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

問鼎九州，逐鹿三國

《逐鹿》的歷史劇本以《三國演義》為藍本推演而來，遊戲貫穿歷史典故，力求還原三國時期的史實風貌。玩家可以任意挑選劇本，並飾演其中一勢力的主公，謀定三國，一統九州。

山河為子，天下為局

《逐鹿》以經典六角戰棋玩法為核心戰鬥模式，玩家可以指揮部隊以「六角戰棋」的形式縱橫馳騁於大戰場之上，或與敵人短兵相接，或以計謀決勝千里之外，在矢石之間，開疆擴土。

堅甲利兵，攻無不克

在遊戲中兵種可分為步兵、騎兵、機械三大類，細分則有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、輕騎兵等十餘種。還有數十種專屬兵種可以攜帶，出征時根據戰況調配兵種陣容，能夠達到先發制人，克敵機先的效果。

鸞翔鳳集，龍幡虎纛

根據歷史文獻記載以及結合三國演義內容，目前遊戲中已設計武將有600余名。每個武將具有獨特的特性，可以凸顯武將的差異化。不僅如此，我們還為歷史名將繪制了精緻的專屬立繪，彰顯其個性。

mo.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

遊戲特色

指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。準備好發動英勇的攻擊，堅守陣地，拯救平民，潛入超級計算機和各種英雄的物品。每個任務需要新的戰術和行動才能取得勝利。

通過17次終結式特別行動的戰術規則測試你的機智。每個關卡通過傷痕銘記挑戰。諒你也不敢。

解鎖不可能模式。僅對大無畏敢死隊開放。諒你絕對不敢。

在史詩戰鬥中擊敗巨大而非凡的頭目。這些頭目卑鄙而異常地巨大，他們決心要將你碾碎。鋼鐵戰隊，整裝待發！

40+升級以提升你的戰略，同時授予你的部隊防禦無人機，凝固汽油彈火箭，反彈爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

14位具有出色能力的英雄聽從你的調遣。將他們訓練到極致出色，否則惹惱他們後果自負。

8種可向敵人發動進攻的特種武器，讓你的戰術更加具有深度。還有什麼比得上一個瞄準了的導彈？對50枚高爆炸炸彈的軌道炮襲擊！

完成70+成就中的任何成就，贏得你應得的獎勵

選擇你的遊戲困難模式，找到屬於你的公平挑戰：休閒，普通或老兵別太狂妄了要么狂妄一點你自己決定！！

mo.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

mo.description:
【遊戲簡介】
《召喚騎士團》是由橄欖熊貓工作室製作的一款RPG卡牌像素風遊戲。 分為《騎士之歌》和《群星之章》兩部分玩法和內容，遊戲將透過「10TWD付費下載，內購解鎖」的方式取得全部的遊玩內容。

【內購解鎖】
全內容解鎖：8.99USD
騎士之歌劇情模式：4.99USD
群星之章自由模式：4.99USD
兩個模式都支持先體驗再付費解鎖，《騎士之歌》可以免費體驗至第二章節結束，《群星之章》免費體驗遊戲內時間一年。
PS：該金額會根據當地匯率進行換算

《騎士之歌》：
劇情改編自諾貝爾文學獎得主亨里克·顯克微支《十字軍騎士》，主要玩法為卡牌的RPG角色扮演，在卡牌戰鬥的同時加入了夥伴技能連攜系統，將根據玩家打出 的牌釋放不同的專屬技能，從而建構不同的流派。 在遊戲中也會認識並招募到眾多同伴，踏上一段波瀾壯闊的旅程。

《群星之章》：
遊戲的主舞台在一個名為安塔納的魔幻大陸上，在這裡擁有風俗迥異的六個國家，玩家將扮演其中一個王國的小領主。
在魔界即將入侵這片大陸的前夕，玩家需要前往各地尋找自己騎士團的伙伴，建立屬於自己的騎士團，展開冒險，增強自己的實力，守護人類戰線。

【設備支援】
·iOS 10.0及更高版本
·運行記憶體3G以及以上機型
·iphone7 以上機型
·ipad Air3以上機型

【聯絡我們】
遊戲過程中需要協助，或遇到問題，可以通過郵件聯絡反饋。
官方郵箱：knight@longyougame.com

mo.description:
《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？

 - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！

 - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。

- 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。

 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。

 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。

 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。

 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

mo.description:
中隊已經到達你的移動設備！躲避子彈風暴，面對可怕的空中戰爭機器！帶領你的中隊在兩個不同的戰役中取得勝利，充滿故事曲折和傳奇首領大戰！

德國空軍王牌 - 中隊是一款驚心動魄的垂直捲動射擊遊戲，具有引人入勝的全語音敘述。躲避子彈，收集大量增強器，明智地使用特殊技能擊敗敵人。總計50個關卡的兩大戰役，一波又一波的各種致命敵人，眾多史詩首領大戰。你能完成任務嗎？

當歐洲看起來還是自由的時候，一個被稱為“德國空軍王牌”的秘密德國突擊隊借此機會反擊並入侵美國！你的責任就是，在誇張的空戰中，駕駛致命的鋼鐵之翼，重建和平與自由！但是，每個故事都有兩個方面。隨著德國空軍王牌開始對美國進攻，你負責帶領一群精銳德國飛行員執行秘密任務。從百慕大三角的一個秘密基地，開始詭計多端的史詩級空中冒險。選擇你的陣營，決定你的角色，然後起飛！

- 驚心動魄的射擊遊戲，具有爆炸性的特效
- 英勇的非玩家角色僚機將遵從你的命令
- 每架僚機都有包含獨特技能的技能樹
- 富有挑戰性的成就系統
- 引人入勝的故事情節和全語音角色
- 50個關卡和刺激的任務 
- 12個壯觀的首領大戰
- 史詩般的電影式管弦樂配樂

mo.releaseNotes: Xcode update
mo.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

mo.description:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE
Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

mo.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

mo.releaseNotes:
本次更新：
1.优化了赛博护士的对话体验
mo.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

mo.description:
在這個快節奏的動作rogue-lite遊戲《孤骨勇士》中，失去頭顱反而是戰鬥的一部分。

遊戲擁有100位獨特能力的可操控角色，配合眾多道具，可創造出既瘋狂又具挑戰性的戰鬥。
魔王城廢墟
人類對魔王城的攻擊歷史悠久，此次卻與眾不同。
這次不僅冒險家加入戰鬥，還有帝國軍隊和被稱為「卡倫之英雄」的領袖共同發動全面攻擊，決心一舉根絕魔族。
他們以壓倒性的人數攻陷了魔族堡壘，並成功將其徹底摧毀。城堡中的所有魔族都被俘虜，唯獨一個名叫「孤骨」的孤獨骷髏逃脫了。
黑暗鏡子模式
完成主線故事後，挑戰自我極限，試試全新的「黑暗鏡子」模式吧！

遊戲特色
- 在這場魔族的絕望之中，你是最後的希望！化身為小小骷髏「孤骨」，踏上旅程去擊敗狂妄的英雄們，解救被卡倫墮落軍隊俘虜的魔王。
- 換上新的孤骨，感受失去頭顱的痛快：借用前任擁有者的力量和華服，搭配獨特的道具來創造連鎖技能，戰勝敵人。
- 不死不休：在這款動作滿載的rogue-lite平台遊戲中，你將迎接一切挑戰，直至最終。
- 觀賞充滿活力、風格卡通的像素藝術2D動畫，幫助各種魔族生物恢復本來面目。
- 從埃及的木乃伊到希臘的牛頭怪，甚至《Dead Cells》的官方跨界合作……你能找到遊戲中所有有趣的彩蛋嗎？

專為移動裝置精心重新設計
- 改進的介面——獨家手機用戶介面，完整的觸控操作
- Game Center 成就
- 雲端儲存——在 iOS 裝置間共享你的進度
- 支援 MFi 控制器
- 兼容 iPhone 15（包括 Pro Max）

mo.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

主要面板特點：

曝光控制
對焦+對焦鎖定控制
飛漲

mo.description:
After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love?

In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city — from Bakırköy to Üsküdar — to find the woman you love.

Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul — from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor.

On your journey to save your girlfriend, you’ll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins—and their stories—will push you to make difficult moral choices.

To move forward, you’ll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely.

Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit.

Witness the struggle to survive—and the power of hope.
In this unforgettable journey, you’ll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

mo.releaseNotes: New update content!
mo.description:
Death is not the end.

Play as a failed alchemic experiment and explore the sprawling, ever-changing castle to find out what happened on this gloomy island…! 
That is, assuming you’re able to fight your way past its keepers.

Dead Cells is a roguevania action platformer that will require you to master frantic 2D combat with a wide variety of weapons and skills against merciless minions and boss.

Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat.

First available on PC and consoles, the indie hit Dead Cells is now slaying foes on mobile!

Main Features
• Roguevania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath

• Frantic and Dynamic 2D Action: Learn your enemies’ patterns to stay alive, or prepare to be sent back to your cell before you can say “baguette”

• Nonlinear Progression: Unlock new levels with every death, opt for the path that suits your current build, your playstyle or just your mood. 
Surely, the ramparts can’t be as bad as the sewers, right?

• Play at your own pace: Will you explore every nook and cranny of the castle, or rush to the end?

*Latest updates are available: Clean Cut & The End is Near*

RETURN TO CASTLEVANIA DLC
Time for some vampire slaying
• New storyline - overcome the Ruler of Darkness alongside Alucard and Richter Belmont,
• 2 new biomes - Explore Dracula's Castle and its outskirts
• 9 new monsters - Werewolves, haunted armors, and medusas are waiting for you
• 14 new weapons - wield the Vampire Killer or the Holy Water to defeat creatures of the night,
• 3 new bosses - go fangs to fangs against Death and Dracula himself
• 20 new outfits - dress as your favorite Castlevania characters such as Simon and Richter Belmont or Alucard
• Alternative soundtracks - play along 51 Castlevania original tracks and 12 tunes reimagined in the style of Dead Cells

THE BAD SEED DLC
You reap what you sow
• New levels to lose your head in the not-so-peaceful Dilapidated Arboretum and the noxious Morass of the Banished
• New monsters to rip to pieces: get to know the locals, such as the Jerkshroom and the Yeeter
• New weapons to play with: trim sticking-out heads with the Scythe Claw, or make them dance to the sound of the Rhythm n' Bouzouki
• New boss to fight against: Mama Tick is dying to meet you

FATAL FALLS DLC
Ready for a leap of faith?
• 3 new biomes - Get some fresh air at the Fractured Shrines, splash around at the Undying Shores and take a picture at the Mausoleum
• 8 new monsters - The Cold Blooded Guardians and their friends would love to teach you about their culture. ... Wait, aren't those relatives of yours in the Undying Shores...?
• 7 new weapons - Lil' Serenade is perfect for breaking the ice with the locals, although the Snake Fangs would make for a perfect souvenir...
• 1 new boss - The Scarecrow is very proud of his gardening skills and won't hesitate to show off


QUEEN AND THE SEA  DLC
Take it to the sea!
• 2 new biomes - Battle your way through a rotten shipwreck, or scale a burning lighthouse and confront your deadliest foe yet.
• 9 new weapons, including a throwable shark, a trident and a pirate hook hand (eyepatch not included). 
• 2 new bosses - Don't lose your head before you meet the Queen!

This DLC also gives you the usual extras: 
- A not-so-cute pet. 
- Loads of new outfits. 
- New enemies to bash.

WARNING: Devices with less than 2 Gb of RAM may not be able to run this content correctly. We recommend not to take this DLC if your device is under 2gb of RAM.


Carefully redesigned for mobile with a revamped interface
• Two game modes available: Original & Auto-Hit

• Custom controls & More touch controls options available: Change the buttons’ position and size to your liking, swipe to dodge…

• MFi external controller support

• No ads, no F2P mechanics!

If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com
 with as much information as possible on the issue.

mo.description:
Escape your childhood fears.

First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile!
 Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears!
Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal.
As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover.
Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out!
Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design.
Sneak your way out of the Maw’s dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. 

FEATURES

- Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure
- Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants
- Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles
- Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE

- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- Compatible with MFi controllers

If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.

mo.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

tw.description:
1985年，一場無法挽回的災難降臨——核戰爭和致命病毒的爆發導致了世界末日，將整個世界變成了一片巨大的放射性荒原，充斥著突變體、掠奪者和瘋子（他們比任何僵尸都可怕）。蘇聯在核打擊中崩潰，整個世界變成了一個每個人都在為生存而戰的競技場。

在一個充滿輻射和怪物的世界中生存並不容易。如今，在昔日世界的廢墟上，暴力、飢餓和疾病統治著一切。作為一名幸存者，你必須在這個對生命充滿敵意的開放世界中適應環境，並尋找和拯救你的家人——也許他們在這場混亂中幸存了下來？……

危險與冒險在每一個轉角等著你。作為一名潛行者，你需要在輻射水平比切爾諾貝利災難還要高數倍的廢棄城市中搜尋物資，並在充滿嗜血突變體和僵尸瘋子的森林中穿行。在這片混亂與廢墟中，你必須運用所有的生存技能，獨自為生命而戰！

《Day R Survival》不僅僅是一款游戲，而是一款真實的核末日生存模擬游戲，背景設定在1985年蘇聯的廣闊而真實的地圖上。

《Day R Survival》的RPG和任務系統是一款硬核的生存模擬RPG。核戰爭和致命病毒（比任何僵尸病毒都可怕）不僅會給你帶來強大而狡猾的敵人，還會讓你面臨艱難的選擇。游戲中的任務充滿了陰暗的氛圍和絕望，人們不得不在昔日世界的廢墟上掙扎求生。


廣闊的開放世界
在1985年蘇聯的逼真地圖上，探索超過2700個廢棄城市。這些城市充滿了資源、危險（如突變體、野生動物和瘋狂的僵尸）以及未解之謎。你可以在森林中狩獵，在河流中釣魚，或是掠奪資源——在這個世界裡，你的生存策略沒有任何限制！

物品制作
數百種真實的制作配方：從日常用品到頂級軍用交通工具和彈藥。你擁有機械、化學、物理或生存方面的知識嗎？現在是時候運用它們了！

在殘酷世界中掙扎求生
你隻是一個普通人，需要食物、水和休息。你會染上疾病，傷口也不會自行愈合。尋找食物，爭奪每一滴干淨的水，建造避難所，並時刻保持警惕——在這個世界上，哪怕是一隻老鼠，都可能要了你的命！


單人模式與多人聯機
你可以獨自挑戰任務，也可以與朋友並肩作戰——隨時在單人和多人模式之間切換，選擇最適合你的生存方式。打造獨特的生存策略，或與志同道合的玩家聯手，通過聊天交流、交易物資，並在末世荒原中共同完成任務，尋找生存的希望。


游戲特色  
在線與離線模式
多人在線生存，與好友組隊挑戰末世危機
難度選擇：簡單、普通、困難，適應不同生存策略
技能成長與強化
動態環境：四季更迭、晝夜交替、輻射水平不斷變化
敵人與資源隨機刷新
逼真廢土氛圍，沉浸式核戰后世界生存挑戰


幸存者！體驗最真實的生存模擬游戲之一——Day R Survival。制定你的生存策略，揭開末日世界的重重謎團，努力活下去！

tw.description:
經典三國單機版

《逐鹿》是一款基於同名歷史沙盤遊戲引擎開發而成的三國題材回合制策略遊戲。在硝煙四起、諸侯爭霸的三國亂世中，玩家可以在劇本中任意選擇勢力，飾演主公。通過內政、外交等玩法助你運籌帷幄。帶領麾下群雄，攻城略地，在遼闊的戰場上開疆擴土。或興復漢室，或成一代梟雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

問鼎九州，逐鹿三國

《逐鹿》的歷史劇本以《三國演義》為藍本推演而來，遊戲貫穿歷史典故，力求還原三國時期的史實風貌。玩家可以任意挑選劇本，並飾演其中一勢力的主公，謀定三國，一統九州。

山河為子，天下為局

《逐鹿》以經典六角戰棋玩法為核心戰鬥模式，玩家可以指揮部隊以「六角戰棋」的形式縱橫馳騁於大戰場之上，或與敵人短兵相接，或以計謀決勝千里之外，在矢石之間，開疆擴土。

堅甲利兵，攻無不克

在遊戲中兵種可分為步兵、騎兵、機械三大類，細分則有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、輕騎兵等十餘種。還有數十種專屬兵種可以攜帶，出征時根據戰況調配兵種陣容，能夠達到先發制人，克敵機先的效果。

鸞翔鳳集，龍幡虎纛

根據歷史文獻記載以及結合三國演義內容，目前遊戲中已設計武將有600余名。每個武將具有獨特的特性，可以凸顯武將的差異化。不僅如此，我們還為歷史名將繪制了精緻的專屬立繪，彰顯其個性。

tw.description:
**Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app for 7 years running**

97% of learners pass their Theory Test using nothing more than this 4 in 1 AWARD-WINNING app*! Revise with full confidence knowing you have EVERYTHING you need to pass your 2025 Theory Test first time, getting you 1 step closer to your full DVLA licence, or we’ll give you your test fee back if you fail.

Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers we’ve helped prepare for their driving theory test.

Suitable for:
• Car Drivers in GB & NI
• Motorcyclists in GB & NI
• Trainee ADI's in GB & NI
• HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI

DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025
Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions!

Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test.

Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when you’re ready to sit the official Theory Test!

FREE PASS GUARANTEE
We’re so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your £23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&C’s apply**.

LEARNER PLAN
Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish.

LEADERBOARD
Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! Earn points for acing practice quizzes, passing Mock Tests and more. Revise for a prize as you make the most of your study sessions.

SMART AI MODE
Want a more tailored approach to revision? Smart AI Mode makes revising for your theory test more efficient and tracks your progress to help you concentrate on the areas where you need the most support.

VOICEOVER
English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia.

HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST
85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test.

THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition
Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover.

ROAD SIGNS 2025
Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions.

Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT
Includes:
• 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test
• The top 10 reasons for failing
• Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety
• A full mock driving test with examiner debrief
• All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign
Helping you get one step closer to your full DVLA licence

EXCLUSIVE BONUS CONTENT
Access to exclusive offers and discounts!

AWARDS:
• Named Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app of 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019 & 2018
• As featured on the Gadget Show
• Intelligent Instructor Product of the Year 2022, 2023 & 2024
• App of the Year, FirstCar Awards 2021 & 2019
• Winner of the Auto Express Theory Test App
• DIA Driver and Rider Training Awards "Product of the Year"

CONTACT US: support@drivingtestsuccess.com

This app includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank. The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

Requires account creation to access content.

*Based users who complete the Learner Plan in full
**Pass Guarantee T&C’s apply. See www.drivingtestsuccess.com/app-pass-guarantee

tw.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

遊戲特色

指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。準備好發動英勇的攻擊，堅守陣地，拯救平民，潛入超級計算機和各種英雄的物品。每個任務需要新的戰術和行動才能取得勝利。

通過17次終結式特別行動的戰術規則測試你的機智。每個關卡通過傷痕銘記挑戰。諒你也不敢。

解鎖不可能模式。僅對大無畏敢死隊開放。諒你絕對不敢。

在史詩戰鬥中擊敗巨大而非凡的頭目。這些頭目卑鄙而異常地巨大，他們決心要將你碾碎。鋼鐵戰隊，整裝待發！

40+升級以提升你的戰略，同時授予你的部隊防禦無人機，凝固汽油彈火箭，反彈爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

14位具有出色能力的英雄聽從你的調遣。將他們訓練到極致出色，否則惹惱他們後果自負。

8種可向敵人發動進攻的特種武器，讓你的戰術更加具有深度。還有什麼比得上一個瞄準了的導彈？對50枚高爆炸炸彈的軌道炮襲擊！

完成70+成就中的任何成就，贏得你應得的獎勵

選擇你的遊戲困難模式，找到屬於你的公平挑戰：休閒，普通或老兵別太狂妄了要么狂妄一點你自己決定！！

tw.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

tw.description:
【遊戲簡介】
《召喚騎士團》是由橄欖熊貓工作室製作的一款RPG卡牌像素風遊戲。 分為《騎士之歌》和《群星之章》兩部分玩法和內容，遊戲將透過「10TWD付費下載，內購解鎖」的方式取得全部的遊玩內容。

【內購解鎖】
全內容解鎖：8.99USD
騎士之歌劇情模式：4.99USD
群星之章自由模式：4.99USD
兩個模式都支持先體驗再付費解鎖，《騎士之歌》可以免費體驗至第二章節結束，《群星之章》免費體驗遊戲內時間一年。
PS：該金額會根據當地匯率進行換算

《騎士之歌》：
劇情改編自諾貝爾文學獎得主亨里克·顯克微支《十字軍騎士》，主要玩法為卡牌的RPG角色扮演，在卡牌戰鬥的同時加入了夥伴技能連攜系統，將根據玩家打出 的牌釋放不同的專屬技能，從而建構不同的流派。 在遊戲中也會認識並招募到眾多同伴，踏上一段波瀾壯闊的旅程。

《群星之章》：
遊戲的主舞台在一個名為安塔納的魔幻大陸上，在這裡擁有風俗迥異的六個國家，玩家將扮演其中一個王國的小領主。
在魔界即將入侵這片大陸的前夕，玩家需要前往各地尋找自己騎士團的伙伴，建立屬於自己的騎士團，展開冒險，增強自己的實力，守護人類戰線。

【設備支援】
·iOS 10.0及更高版本
·運行記憶體3G以及以上機型
·iphone7 以上機型
·ipad Air3以上機型

【聯絡我們】
遊戲過程中需要協助，或遇到問題，可以通過郵件聯絡反饋。
官方郵箱：knight@longyougame.com

tw.trackCensoredName: Day R Premium: last world war
tw.description:
1985年，一場無法挽回的災難降臨——核戰爭和致命病毒的爆發導致了世界末日，將整個世界變成了一片巨大的放射性荒原，充斥著突變體、掠奪者和瘋子（他們比任何僵尸都可怕）。蘇聯在核打擊中崩潰，整個世界變成了一個每個人都在為生存而戰的競技場。

在一個充滿輻射和怪物的世界中生存並不容易。如今，在昔日世界的廢墟上，暴力、飢餓和疾病統治著一切。作為一名幸存者，你必須在這個對生命充滿敵意的開放世界中適應環境，並尋找和拯救你的家人——也許他們在這場混亂中幸存了下來？……

危險與冒險在每一個轉角等著你。作為一名潛行者，你需要在輻射水平比切爾諾貝利災難還要高數倍的廢棄城市中搜尋物資，並在充滿嗜血突變體和僵尸瘋子的森林中穿行。在這片混亂與廢墟中，你必須運用所有的生存技能，獨自為生命而戰！

《Day R Survival》不僅僅是一款游戲，而是一款真實的核末日生存模擬游戲，背景設定在1985年蘇聯的廣闊而真實的地圖上。

《Day R Survival》的RPG和任務系統是一款硬核的生存模擬RPG。核戰爭和致命病毒（比任何僵尸病毒都可怕）不僅會給你帶來強大而狡猾的敵人，還會讓你面臨艱難的選擇。游戲中的任務充滿了陰暗的氛圍和絕望，人們不得不在昔日世界的廢墟上掙扎求生。


廣闊的開放世界
在1985年蘇聯的逼真地圖上，探索超過2700個廢棄城市。這些城市充滿了資源、危險（如突變體、野生動物和瘋狂的僵尸）以及未解之謎。你可以在森林中狩獵，在河流中釣魚，或是掠奪資源——在這個世界裡，你的生存策略沒有任何限制！

物品制作
數百種真實的制作配方：從日常用品到頂級軍用交通工具和彈藥。你擁有機械、化學、物理或生存方面的知識嗎？現在是時候運用它們了！

在殘酷世界中掙扎求生
你隻是一個普通人，需要食物、水和休息。你會染上疾病，傷口也不會自行愈合。尋找食物，爭奪每一滴干淨的水，建造避難所，並時刻保持警惕——在這個世界上，哪怕是一隻老鼠，都可能要了你的命！


單人模式與多人聯機
你可以獨自挑戰任務，也可以與朋友並肩作戰——隨時在單人和多人模式之間切換，選擇最適合你的生存方式。打造獨特的生存策略，或與志同道合的玩家聯手，通過聊天交流、交易物資，並在末世荒原中共同完成任務，尋找生存的希望。


游戲特色  
在線與離線模式
多人在線生存，與好友組隊挑戰末世危機
難度選擇：簡單、普通、困難，適應不同生存策略
技能成長與強化
動態環境：四季更迭、晝夜交替、輻射水平不斷變化
敵人與資源隨機刷新
逼真廢土氛圍，沉浸式核戰后世界生存挑戰


幸存者！體驗最真實的生存模擬游戲之一——Day R Survival。制定你的生存策略，揭開末日世界的重重謎團，努力活下去！

tw.description:
《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？

 - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！

 - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。

- 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。

 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。

 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。

 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。

 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

tw.description:
中隊已經到達你的移動設備！躲避子彈風暴，面對可怕的空中戰爭機器！帶領你的中隊在兩個不同的戰役中取得勝利，充滿故事曲折和傳奇首領大戰！

德國空軍王牌 - 中隊是一款驚心動魄的垂直捲動射擊遊戲，具有引人入勝的全語音敘述。躲避子彈，收集大量增強器，明智地使用特殊技能擊敗敵人。總計50個關卡的兩大戰役，一波又一波的各種致命敵人，眾多史詩首領大戰。你能完成任務嗎？

當歐洲看起來還是自由的時候，一個被稱為“德國空軍王牌”的秘密德國突擊隊借此機會反擊並入侵美國！你的責任就是，在誇張的空戰中，駕駛致命的鋼鐵之翼，重建和平與自由！但是，每個故事都有兩個方面。隨著德國空軍王牌開始對美國進攻，你負責帶領一群精銳德國飛行員執行秘密任務。從百慕大三角的一個秘密基地，開始詭計多端的史詩級空中冒險。選擇你的陣營，決定你的角色，然後起飛！

- 驚心動魄的射擊遊戲，具有爆炸性的特效
- 英勇的非玩家角色僚機將遵從你的命令
- 每架僚機都有包含獨特技能的技能樹
- 富有挑戰性的成就系統
- 引人入勝的故事情節和全語音角色
- 50個關卡和刺激的任務 
- 12個壯觀的首領大戰
- 史詩般的電影式管弦樂配樂

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.releaseNotes: Xcode update
tw.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

tw.releaseNotes: Xcode update
tw.description:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE
Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

tw.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

advisories: 偶而/輕微醫藥/醫療資訊
tw.trackCensoredName: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验
tw.trackName: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验
tw.releaseNotes:
本次更新：
1.优化了赛博护士的对话体验
tw.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.releaseNotes:
迎戰蜘蛛女王和她的信徒吧！

- 3個讓人毛骨悚然的全新關卡
- 1場很多隻腳的BOSS戰
- 7種爬行可怖的全新敵人
- 1座利尼維亞的新防禦塔
- 1位黑暗大軍的全新英雄
- 5項讓人背脊發寒的成就
tw.description:
比以往任何時候都更具威脅和力量，Kingdom Rush 5：Alliance 帶來了一種全新、令人興奮的體驗，以其前作的快節奏和引人入勝的玩法為基礎，贏得了獎項的讚譽。

當一種強大的邪惡浮現時，一個意想不到的聯盟正在形成！需要Linirea的最佳戰士和不屈不撓的黑暗軍團來阻止它。小心！儘管他們可能並肩旅行，命運的變幻莫測之風可能會迅速改變他們的方向。

準備在戰場上發揮雙英雄的強大力量！
是的，現在你不僅可以玩一個龍，還可以玩兩個龍！雙倍的噴火樂趣，雙倍的混亂——只要確保他們不會爭吵誰能囤積更多的金子！ 

所有重量級角色如聖騎士、弓箭手、法師、死靈法師等等都聽你指揮。但要注意，他們可能會開始爭論誰是隊伍中的真正英雄，而敵人卻悄悄溜過去！ 
你準備好迎接終極對決了嗎？和Linirea的勇敢戰士們以及不屈不撓的暗黑軍團一起，踏上征服一個巨大敵人的史詩旅程。 

遊戲特色：
招募34名獨特的英雄和塔樓！

- 18個精英塔樓建造和升級
沒有強大的防禦塔的策略遊戲算什麼？奪取它們，以對抗任何敵人！
選擇精準的弓箭手、致命的聖騎士，甚至是狡猾的惡魔坑。

- 16個史詩英雄 - 將塔防戰鬥提升到新的水平
同時使用2位英雄玩！
準備見證最不可能的雙英雄組合的強大威力。一個森林守護靈和一個強大的戰鬥機器人，或者是一個彎曲空間的法師和你的平均喬。

- 6種地形，擁有迷人的戰場等你征服
保衛Kingdom Rush的多彩景觀。穿越王國深林，甚至其危險的洞穴作戰。

- 25個充滿快節奏td戰鬥的戰役階段
在充滿驚喜挑戰和細節的異國地形中設定你的策略。
面對成群的不可預測的敵人和史詩般的boss戰鬥，將你的防禦策略推向極限！

- 3種不同的遊戲模式來測試你的實力
在取得勝利後，嘗試以更具挑戰性的方式玩每個階段。誰不喜歡一個好的挑戰呢？

- 58多個遊戲成就在戰鬥中征服
沒有誘人的獎勵，史詩策略遊戲算什麼？展示你的技能，解鎖獎勵！

- 45種以上不同的敵人來測試你的塔防智慧
展現聯盟的td戰鬥技能，對抗4個不同的敵人氏族。用獨特的防禦策略擊敗他們每一個！

- 當然…
有很多復活節彩蛋和Ironhide Game Studio一貫的輕鬆幽默。
因為沒有一些隱藏的驚喜，策略遊戲算什麼呢？


--------
Ironhide的服務條款：https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService
Ironhide隱私政策：https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy

tw.releaseNotes:
Hello Skul mobile players, here's a new patch that we hope will improve your experience of the game. Have fun!
-fix loss of skulls and inventory during a run
-fix can't pass the title screen with controller
-fix minor UI bug with controller
tw.description:
在這個快節奏的動作rogue-lite遊戲《孤骨勇士》中，失去頭顱反而是戰鬥的一部分。

遊戲擁有100位獨特能力的可操控角色，配合眾多道具，可創造出既瘋狂又具挑戰性的戰鬥。
魔王城廢墟
人類對魔王城的攻擊歷史悠久，此次卻與眾不同。
這次不僅冒險家加入戰鬥，還有帝國軍隊和被稱為「卡倫之英雄」的領袖共同發動全面攻擊，決心一舉根絕魔族。
他們以壓倒性的人數攻陷了魔族堡壘，並成功將其徹底摧毀。城堡中的所有魔族都被俘虜，唯獨一個名叫「孤骨」的孤獨骷髏逃脫了。
黑暗鏡子模式
完成主線故事後，挑戰自我極限，試試全新的「黑暗鏡子」模式吧！

遊戲特色
- 在這場魔族的絕望之中，你是最後的希望！化身為小小骷髏「孤骨」，踏上旅程去擊敗狂妄的英雄們，解救被卡倫墮落軍隊俘虜的魔王。
- 換上新的孤骨，感受失去頭顱的痛快：借用前任擁有者的力量和華服，搭配獨特的道具來創造連鎖技能，戰勝敵人。
- 不死不休：在這款動作滿載的rogue-lite平台遊戲中，你將迎接一切挑戰，直至最終。
- 觀賞充滿活力、風格卡通的像素藝術2D動畫，幫助各種魔族生物恢復本來面目。
- 從埃及的木乃伊到希臘的牛頭怪，甚至《Dead Cells》的官方跨界合作……你能找到遊戲中所有有趣的彩蛋嗎？

專為移動裝置精心重新設計
- 改進的介面——獨家手機用戶介面，完整的觸控操作
- Game Center 成就
- 雲端儲存——在 iOS 裝置間共享你的進度
- 支援 MFi 控制器
- 兼容 iPhone 15（包括 Pro Max）

tw.description:
After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love?

In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city — from Bakırköy to Üsküdar — to find the woman you love.

Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul — from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor.

On your journey to save your girlfriend, you’ll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins—and their stories—will push you to make difficult moral choices.

To move forward, you’ll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely.

Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit.

Witness the struggle to survive—and the power of hope.
In this unforgettable journey, you’ll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

tw.description:
Death is not the end.

Play as a failed alchemic experiment and explore the sprawling, ever-changing castle to find out what happened on this gloomy island…! 
That is, assuming you’re able to fight your way past its keepers.

Dead Cells is a roguevania action platformer that will require you to master frantic 2D combat with a wide variety of weapons and skills against merciless minions and boss.

Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat.

First available on PC and consoles, the indie hit Dead Cells is now slaying foes on mobile!

Main Features
• Roguevania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath

• Frantic and Dynamic 2D Action: Learn your enemies’ patterns to stay alive, or prepare to be sent back to your cell before you can say “baguette”

• Nonlinear Progression: Unlock new levels with every death, opt for the path that suits your current build, your playstyle or just your mood. 
Surely, the ramparts can’t be as bad as the sewers, right?

• Play at your own pace: Will you explore every nook and cranny of the castle, or rush to the end?

*Latest updates are available: Clean Cut & The End is Near*

RETURN TO CASTLEVANIA DLC
Time for some vampire slaying
• New storyline - overcome the Ruler of Darkness alongside Alucard and Richter Belmont,
• 2 new biomes - Explore Dracula's Castle and its outskirts
• 9 new monsters - Werewolves, haunted armors, and medusas are waiting for you
• 14 new weapons - wield the Vampire Killer or the Holy Water to defeat creatures of the night,
• 3 new bosses - go fangs to fangs against Death and Dracula himself
• 20 new outfits - dress as your favorite Castlevania characters such as Simon and Richter Belmont or Alucard
• Alternative soundtracks - play along 51 Castlevania original tracks and 12 tunes reimagined in the style of Dead Cells

THE BAD SEED DLC
You reap what you sow
• New levels to lose your head in the not-so-peaceful Dilapidated Arboretum and the noxious Morass of the Banished
• New monsters to rip to pieces: get to know the locals, such as the Jerkshroom and the Yeeter
• New weapons to play with: trim sticking-out heads with the Scythe Claw, or make them dance to the sound of the Rhythm n' Bouzouki
• New boss to fight against: Mama Tick is dying to meet you

FATAL FALLS DLC
Ready for a leap of faith?
• 3 new biomes - Get some fresh air at the Fractured Shrines, splash around at the Undying Shores and take a picture at the Mausoleum
• 8 new monsters - The Cold Blooded Guardians and their friends would love to teach you about their culture. ... Wait, aren't those relatives of yours in the Undying Shores...?
• 7 new weapons - Lil' Serenade is perfect for breaking the ice with the locals, although the Snake Fangs would make for a perfect souvenir...
• 1 new boss - The Scarecrow is very proud of his gardening skills and won't hesitate to show off


QUEEN AND THE SEA  DLC
Take it to the sea!
• 2 new biomes - Battle your way through a rotten shipwreck, or scale a burning lighthouse and confront your deadliest foe yet.
• 9 new weapons, including a throwable shark, a trident and a pirate hook hand (eyepatch not included). 
• 2 new bosses - Don't lose your head before you meet the Queen!

This DLC also gives you the usual extras: 
- A not-so-cute pet. 
- Loads of new outfits. 
- New enemies to bash.

WARNING: Devices with less than 2 Gb of RAM may not be able to run this content correctly. We recommend not to take this DLC if your device is under 2gb of RAM.


Carefully redesigned for mobile with a revamped interface
• Two game modes available: Original & Auto-Hit

• Custom controls & More touch controls options available: Change the buttons’ position and size to your liking, swipe to dodge…

• MFi external controller support

• No ads, no F2P mechanics!

If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com
 with as much information as possible on the issue.

First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile!

Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design.

us.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

us.description:
經典三國單機版

《逐鹿》是一款基於同名歷史沙盤遊戲引擎開發而成的三國題材回合制策略遊戲。在硝煙四起、諸侯爭霸的三國亂世中，玩家可以在劇本中任意選擇勢力，飾演主公。通過內政、外交等玩法助你運籌帷幄。帶領麾下群雄，攻城略地，在遼闊的戰場上開疆擴土。或興復漢室，或成一代梟雄，皆掌握在你的手中。

問鼎九州，逐鹿三國

《逐鹿》的歷史劇本以《三國演義》為藍本推演而來，遊戲貫穿歷史典故，力求還原三國時期的史實風貌。玩家可以任意挑選劇本，並飾演其中一勢力的主公，謀定三國，一統九州。

山河為子，天下為局

《逐鹿》以經典六角戰棋玩法為核心戰鬥模式，玩家可以指揮部隊以「六角戰棋」的形式縱橫馳騁於大戰場之上，或與敵人短兵相接，或以計謀決勝千里之外，在矢石之間，開疆擴土。

堅甲利兵，攻無不克

在遊戲中兵種可分為步兵、騎兵、機械三大類，細分則有弓兵、弩兵、盾兵、輕騎兵等十餘種。還有數十種專屬兵種可以攜帶，出征時根據戰況調配兵種陣容，能夠達到先發制人，克敵機先的效果。

鸞翔鳳集，龍幡虎纛

根據歷史文獻記載以及結合三國演義內容，目前遊戲中已設計武將有600余名。每個武將具有獨特的特性，可以凸顯武將的差異化。不僅如此，我們還為歷史名將繪制了精緻的專屬立繪，彰顯其個性。

us.description:
Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now!

Voted "Best Digital Board Game” in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021
Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide

Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It’s a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don’t. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts!

Features

The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life.
• A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams
• *NEW*  VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat
• AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions
• 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese
• SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI
• ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game
• PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience

How to play

CUSTOMISE your character
Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own.

SPIN THE SPINNER
The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose?

It’s your LIFE PATH
Get married or don’t, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours!

More WAYS TO WIN
Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid.

RETIRE your way
Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on!

Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items
Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards!

In-game Video Chat
Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It’s super easy to set-up and play:

• Create your free private account
• Invite your friends and family to chat groups
• Start games straight from those chats
• Play face-to-face wherever you are

It’s simple, seamless fun for everyone.

The Ultimate Life Collection
Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together.

Benefits of Premium version:
- Unique pet Raven
- Starter Kit
- Caches of useful items in shelters
- Expanded selection of perks

Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. 

It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies – you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. 

- Hardcore survival:
Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax.

- Realistic world:
The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness!

- A lot of opportunities:
Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition.

- People and stories:
Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world.

- Improve your skills:
Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others.

- Cooperative mode:
The Online mode  with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game.

Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials.
Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! 

Features: 
- Сraft system – get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! 
- Hardcore simulator of survival 
- Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode 
- Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online
War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other.

us.description:
【Game Introduction】
'Call of Knights' is an RPG card pixel-style game developed by Olive Panda Studio. It is divided into two parts: 'Song of the Knight' and 'Shining Stars,' each offering unique gameplay and content. The game adopts paid download, in-app purchase to unlock model to access all gameplay content.

【In-App Purchases Unlock】
Full Content Unlock: $8.99 USD
Story Mode of Song of the Knight: $4.99 USD
Free Mode of Shining Stars: $4.99 USD
Both modes support experiencing before paying for unlocking. 'Song of the Knight' can be experienced for free until the end of the second chapter, and 'Shining Stars' offers free gameplay for one year. 
Note: The amounts will be converted based on the local exchange rate.

'Song of the Knight':
The story is adapted from the Nobel Prize-winning author Henrik Hien's 'The Knights of the Cross.' The main gameplay involves RPG role-playing with cards, incorporating a partner skill combo system during card battles. Different cards played release exclusive skills, constructing various playstyles. Players will also meet and recruit numerous companions, embarking on an epic journey.

'Shining Stars':
The game is set in a magical continent called Antana, featuring six countries with diverse customs. Players take on the role of a small lord in one of the kingdoms. As the demonic realm is about to invade the continent, players must travel far and wide to find companions for their knightly order, establish their own knightly order, embark on adventures, strengthen their abilities, and defend the human frontlines.

【Device Support】
· iOS 10.0 and above
· Operating memory of 3GB and above
· iPhone 7 and above
· iPad Air 3 and above

【Contact Us】
If you need assistance during the game or encounter issues, feel free to contact us via email.
Official Email: knight@longyougame.com

us.description:
Dive into a deep story of corruption, crime and intrigue. Take the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, and come face to face with the ugly underbelly of Freeburg, a city spiraling the drain. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse? 

Manage your staff, respond to emergencies, and investigate crimes in a city on the brink of chaos. The mafia underworld maneuvers behind the scenes, sinking their claws ever deeper into the city, even as the mayor is ready to exploit every situation to his political advantage. 

Choose your approach to each situation as it unfolds. Sometimes you’ll be responding to a developing crisis at a crime scene, or negotiating with Freeburg’s crime bosses. Sometimes you’ll find yourself dodging questions in the press room, or even the occasional cross-examination in the witness box. Can you keep this pressure cooker from exploding, at least for long enough to stash away a nice retirement nest egg?

- Your mission is clear: make $500,000 in 180 days before Jack Boyd reaches retirement. How? That’s up to you!

- Decisions, decisions! This Is the Police is all about a dark story and how you react to it. Whatever you decide, your choices will influence the game – and the fate of Jack Boyd.

- The Good, the Bad, and... the Ugly? The Chief of Freeburg's Police Department deals with all kind of people. It is up to you to find the bad guys and decide how to deal with them.

- Carry out your duties. As head of Freeburg PD, Jack deals with all sorts of challenges every day: responding to emergencies, managing his officers, defending the department against City Hall and a corrupt mayor, and much more.

- Solve Investigations and gather evidence against the criminal gangs of Freeburg.

- Deal with the competing powers of the city. Everyone offers you favors, and each one comes at a price.
Rich and fully voiced story: Jack Boyd is portrayed by Jon St. John, the voice of Duke Nukem.
